languages.text: "Неужели даже в этом месте я не заслуживаю вашей правды, Мастер ван Калокс? Я же вижу... каждый всполох алого, возникающий при ваших движениях".
"Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."
languages.original_text: "Неужели даже в этом месте я не заслуживаю вашей правды, Мастер ван Калокс? Я же вижу... каждый всполох алого, возникающий при ваших движениях".

traits.locale_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."

traits.locale_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “即便是在这种地方，我也不配从你口中听到真话吗，冯·卡洛克斯大师？我能看到……你的每个动作都闪烁着猩红色的光芒。”
languages.original_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."

traits.locale_text: “即便是在这种地方，我也不配从你口中听到真话吗，冯·卡洛克斯大师？我能看到……你的每个动作都闪烁着猩红色的光芒。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Même en un tel lieu, vous continuez de me mentir, maître van Calox ? Alors que je vois très clairement les éclats rouge écarlate qui vous suivent comme votre ombre... »
languages.original_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."

traits.locale_text: « Même en un tel lieu, vous continuez de me mentir, maître van Calox ? Alors que je vois très clairement les éclats rouge écarlate qui vous suivent comme votre ombre... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Acaso no merezco la verdad ni siquiera aquí, maestro van Calox? Puedo ver... destellos de escarlata que acompañan cada movimiento que hace».
languages.original_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso no merezco la verdad ni siquiera aquí, maestro van Calox? Puedo ver... destellos de escarlata que acompañan cada movimiento que hace».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この期に及んでも、私に真実をさらす価値はありませんか、マスタ－・ヴァン・キャロックス？わかるのです…緋色の閃光が絶えずあなたと共に在ると」
languages.original_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."

traits.locale_text: 「この期に及んでも、私に真実をさらす価値はありませんか、マスタ－・ヴァン・キャロックス？わかるのです…緋色の閃光が絶えずあなたと共に在ると」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Habe ich denn nicht einmal hier die Wahrheit von Euch verdient, Meister van Calox? Ich sehe ... die roten Blitze, die jede Eurer Bewegungen begleiten."
languages.original_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."

traits.locale_text: "Habe ich denn nicht einmal hier die Wahrheit von Euch verdient, Meister van Calox? Ich sehe ... die roten Blitze, die jede Eurer Bewegungen begleiten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."

languages.text: "Burada bile senden hakikati duymayı hak etmiyor muyum Üstat van Calox? Her hareketinde bir kızıllık seziyorum."
languages.original_text: "Do I not deserve the truth from you even in this place, Master van Calox? I can see... the flashes of scarlet that accompany your every movement."

traits.locale_text: "Burada bile senden hakikati duymayı hak etmiyor muyum Üstat van Calox? Her hareketinde bir kızıllık seziyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
